User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user of the TubeQueue application, specifically the admin.

uid.description: The unique identifier from Firebase Authentication.

email.description: The user's email address, used for login.

YouTubeAccount.title: YouTubeAccount
YouTubeAccount.description: Stores the YouTube account information associated with a user, including OAuth tokens.

id.description: Unique identifier for the YouTube account entity.

accessToken.description: OAuth access token for the YouTube account.

refreshToken.description: OAuth refresh token for the YouTube account.

expirationDate.description: Expiration date and time of the access token.

youtubeChannelId.description: The YouTube channel ID associated with the account.

PlaylistEntry.title: PlaylistEntry
PlaylistEntry.description: Represents an entry in the YouTube playlist.

id.description: Unique identifier for the playlist entry.

addedAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the video was added to the playlist.

requestedBy.description: The IP address of the user that requested the video.

definition.description: Stores user profiles for admin users.

params.name: userId
params.description: The unique identifier for the user (matches Firebase Auth UID).

definition.description: Stores YouTube account information associated with a user.

params.name: userId
params.description: The unique identifier for the user.

definition.description: Stores playlist entries for the active YouTube account.
